from delta.tables import DeltaTable

df_Yearly = my_aggregate(df_Yearly, 'Year', sum, ['Price','KW_Consumption'])
df_Monthly = my_aggregate(df_Monthly, 'Month_Name', sum, ['Price','KW_Consumption'])

Yearly_Bill = "abfss://staging@mysynstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Agva/Spark_Yearly_Bill"

try:
    df_Yearly.write.format("delta").save(Yearly_Bill)
    print('Table does not exist. Created new table.')
except:
    print('Table Found. Updating existing table...')
    delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, Yearly_Bill)

    result = delta_table.alias("target").merge(
        df_Yearly.alias("source"),
        "target.Year = source.Year") \
        .whenMatchedUpdateAll() \
        .whenNotMatchedInsertAll() \
        .execute()
    
    print(result)
